txt-vrp-desc: Vanilla Raytraced is a resource pack for Minecraft Windows 10 edition that adds PBR resources. This pack aims to remain as faithful as possible to the vanilla version of Minecraft. It will therefore allow you to take advantage of the full potential of the raytracing without denaturing Minecraft.
txt-vrp-issues: If you encounter bugs while using this pack, please open an issue on Github
txt-vrp-downloadCount: Vanilla Raytraced already has downloads!
txt-vrpAddons-mirror-desc: Mirror Addons for Vanilla Raytraced replace end_bricks texture with a mirror one. This addon could be helpful with Modernistic build.
txt-vrpAddons-glass-desc: Clean Glass Addon for Vanilla Raytraced makes the glass completely transparent. This addon could be helpful with modernistic build.
